senses.sense_definition: To be unable to breathe because the passage to the lungs is blocked by food, liquid, or an object.

examples.text: He started to <w>choke</w> on a piece of dry bread.
The thick smoke from the fire made us cough and <w>choke</w>.

senses.sense_definition: To stop someone from breathing by squeezing their throat or blocking their windpipe.

examples.text: The tight collar of his shirt began to <w>choke</w> him.
He claimed that the attacker tried to <w>choke</w> him during the fight.

senses.sense_definition: To fill a space or passage so completely that movement is difficult or impossible.

examples.text: The city streets were <w>choked</w> with heavy traffic during rush hour.
Weeds will soon <w>choke</w> the garden if you do not remove them.

senses.sense_definition: To fail or perform poorly at a crucial moment because of nervousness or pressure.

examples.text: The team has a lot of talent, but they tend to <w>choke</w> in the finals.
He was winning the match easily until he started to <w>choke</w> under pressure.

senses.sense_definition: To be unable to speak clearly or normally because of strong emotion.

examples.text: She tried to speak, but her voice <w>choked</w> with emotion.
He had to <w>choke</w> back tears as he said goodbye.

senses.sense_definition: A device in a vehicle engine that reduces air flow to help the engine start when it is cold.

examples.text: You need to pull out the <w>choke</w> before you try to start this old truck.
The mechanic adjusted the <w>choke</w> to fix the starting problem.

senses.sense_definition: A hold around the neck that restricts breathing, used in martial arts or wrestling.

examples.text: The fighter won the match by applying a tight <w>choke</w> on his opponent.
He tapped out quickly once the <w>choke</w> was locked in.

senses.sense_definition: The inedible mass of fibers in the center of an artichoke heart.

examples.text: Use a spoon to scrape out the fuzzy <w>choke</w> before eating the heart.
If you do not remove the <w>choke</w>, the artichoke will be unpleasant to eat.
